dmca.title: tropico kennels
dmca.body: Another breeder is suing Clairyce for the same thing I am and now we have teamed up, my attorney tried to serve her papers, but I guess she's dead, so I will be suing her estate and I plan to sue you as well! I look forward to seeing you in court! I will give you the opportunity to redeem yourself, you can write me an apology on rip off reposts, because you lied when you said I breed uncleared dogs, you lied about several things, so you can either set the record straight an apology or be served court papers and if you do not show up to defend yourself you will automatically lose and I will have a judgment against you good in your state and I will mark your credit report and go after your pay check or bank account.
